com.devclue.grouper.stem
Class StemQ

java.lang.Object
  com.devclue.grouper.stem.StemQ
public class StemQ
extends java.lang.Object

Query for stems within the Groups Registry.

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Query each stem named like the command line arguments.

Stems printed to STDOUT if found.

Exits with 0 if all stems found, 1 otherwise.

 // Query for stems named like com
 % java com.devclue.grouper.stem.StemQ com

 // Query for stems named like com:example and
 // org:example
 % java com.devclue.grouper.stem.StemQ com:example org:example

getStems

public java.util.Set getStems(java.lang.String name)
Perform fuzzy query for stems by name and displayName. 
 // Query for stems named like com:example.
 StemQ  sq    = new StemQ();
 Set    stems = sq.getStems("com:example");

Parameters:
name - Name to query on.
Returns:
Set of found stems.
